name: Beef Egg Patty (One Patty per Serving About 3” Dia)
description: This Beef Egg Patty recipe is perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. It is a healthy take on a classic dish, aiming to provide a nutritious meal without sacrificing flavor. Ideal for everyone looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle with delicious, healthified recipes.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Finely dice the onion and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, beat the eggs lightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced onion, minced garlic, marjoram, tarragon, salt, black pepper, and lean ground beef to the bowl with the beaten eggs. Mix thoroughly until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a skillet or non-stick pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop out a portion of the beef and egg mixture and form into a patty approximately 3” in diameter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Place the patty in the preheated skillet, cooking for 5 minutes on each side or until fully cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
